Carrageenan, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Xanthan Gum, Hexylene Glycol, Calcium Pca, Magnesium Pca, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Algin, Disodium Rutinyl Disulfate, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Vegetable Glycerides Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid
